Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B:
Active for ALL Mode Changes
The following variable is set when triggered: %st_mode

Thing: ALL Attribute: ALL
The following variables are set when triggered: %st_attr_name %st_attr_value %st_thing_id %st_thing_name

Thing: Front Light Attribute: switch
The following variables are set when triggered: %st_attr_name %st_attr_value %st_thing_id %st_thing_name

Thing: Rear Light Attribute: switch
The following variables are set when triggered: %st_attr_name %st_attr_value %st_thing_id %st_thing_name

Thing: Porch Light Attribute: switch
The following variables are set when triggered: %st_attr_name %st_attr_value %st_thing_id %st_thing_name

Thing: Keurig Attribute: switch
The following variables are set when triggered: %st_attr_name %st_attr_value %st_thing_id %st_thing_name

Gets the current mode. Returns the following variables:
%st_mode - Current Mode %st_modes() - Available Modes [array]
